mapper.sql: SELECT trade_no, U.user_no, user_nick, trade_category , trade_title, trade_date, trade_hit FROM ztrade T INNER JOIN zuser U ON U.user_no(+) = T.user_no
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, sub.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T.trade_no, U.user_no, U.user_nick, T.trade_category, T.trade_title, T.trade_date, T.trade_hit , f.file_stored, UW.grade_url, nvl(R.report_status, 'n') report_status, cnt.trade_com_cnt FROM ztrade T, zuser U, ztrade_report R, USERWITHURL UW, zfile f, ( SELECT count(trade_com_no) trade_com_cnt, trade_no FROM ztrade_comment group by trade_no ) cnt WHERE 1=1 AND U.user_no(+) = T.user_no AND R.trade_no(+) = T.trade_no AND UW.user_no(+) = U.user_no AND cnt.trade_no(+) = T.trade_no AND F.file_no(+) = T.file_no AND trade_title LIKE '%' || #{search } || '%'
AND trade_category = 0
AND trade_category = 1
ORDER BY trade_no DESC ) sub ) ZTRADE WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }

SELECT count(*) FROM (
AND trade_category = 0
AND trade_category = 1
)
